text: surges of hot ash and gas still spewing
more than two days after a powerful
eruption these images just a snapshot of
the widespread panic of those living
near Mount Sinabung slopes the danger
alert now raised to its highest level
our worry is that Cinna boom remains
very active till now and the hot ash is
still threatening the neighboring areas
we had to evacuate a new group of
residents from their villages at least
3,000 people living near its slopes have
had to leave including 1200 on Monday
alone Mount Sinabung is one of about a
hundred and thirty volcanoes currently
active in Indonesia before 2010 the
volcano had been dormant for more than
400 years a military commander in
Sumatra has said it's likely thousands
more will have to evacuate scientists
worry the volcano could pose more
dangers in the coming weeks Katarina mo
BBC news
